thread.title: Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters
thread.title_full: Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters

title: Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters
text:
> Entertainment Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters FILE - In this July 25, 2013 file photo, American jazz saxophonist Archie Shepp performs at the Five Continents Jazz Festival in Marseille, southern France. Shepp, along with fellow saxophonist Pharoah Sanders and vibraphonist Gary Burton, are the newest recipients of the 2016 Jazz Masters. The awards will be presented on April 4 at a concert at the Kennedy Center. (AP Photo/Claude Paris, File)
